title: Kids' beanie Hattara
descriptionHtml:
Classic kids' beanie in cool colours.

[--Read More--]

Keep the chill off with this kids' cotton beanie. Without a lining, it's lightweight and super comfortable. The classic style comes in great colours!

[product][info]
  • Kids' and juniors' beanie
  • Elastic cotton knit
  • Reima logo badge
[product][mats]

Material:
100% cotton

[product][care]

Care label instructions:

Wash separately inside out. Reshape to dry. Shrinkage 5%.
